entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kamsack
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
